sentences.sContent: Before singing, he noodled at his guitar.
sentences.sCn: 唱歌之前他先弹了几下吉他。

sentences.sContent: He strummed his guitar when he talked to me.
sentences.sCn: 他和我说话时把吉他拨弄响了。

phrases.pCn: （伴随节拍弹奏的想像中的）空气吉他；幻想吉他

trans.tranOther: a musical instrument usually with six strings that you play by pulling the strings with your fingers or with a  plectrum
